price: 50. (Y se les dirá a quienes estén en el Infierno:) “Esto es, en verdad, (el castigo) sobre el que dudaban”.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā mā kuntum bihi tamtarūna
